Aerial Assault.card_desc: [Advance] Advance gains a 3rd charge, standing still causes Ruckus to jet upwards.

At The Ready.card_desc: [Missile Launcher] Successful hits with Rocket Launcher restore {scale=5|5} ammunition.

Countermeasure.card_desc: [Armor] Dropping below 30% of your max health grants you a {scale=150|150} health shield for 4s.

Crystal Capacitor.card_desc: [Missile Launcher] Reduce the Cooldown of Missile Launcher by {scale=0.7|0.7}s.

Fuel Reserves.card_desc: [Advance] Increase the distance of Advance by {scale=7|7}%

Metal March.card_desc: [Missile Launcher] Gain {scale=3|3}% damage reduction for 2s after activating Missile Launcher.

Nanotechnology.card_desc: [Emitter] While Emitter is active, heal for {scale=50|50} Health each second.

No Chill.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase your movement speed while firing by {scale=5|5}%

Opulence.card_desc: [Missile Launcher] Heal for {scale=100|100} health when activating Missile Launcher.

Proximity.card_desc: [Advance] Activating Advance grants {scale=3|3}% damage reduction for 3s.

Quick Loader.card_desc: [Weapon] Eliminations increase your reload speed by {scale=7|7}% for 5s.

Refraction.card_desc: [Emitter] Reduce the Cooldown of Emitter by {scale=1|1}s.

Regenerative Alloy.card_desc: [Emitter] While Emitter is active generate {scale=5|5} ammo per second.

Rocket Barrage.card_desc: [Missile Launcher] You may hold up to 3 charges of Missile Launcher.

Warden.card_desc: [Emitter] Increases the duration of Emitter by {scale=1|1}s.

Bremsd\u00e4mpfer.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=150|150} LP.

Flux-Generator.card_desc: [Emitter] Der Schild von Emitter wird um 1250 LP verstärkt.

Gegensteuern.card_desc: [Rüstung] Fällst du unter 30% deiner maximalen Gesundheit, erhältst du 4s lang einen Schild mit {scale=150|150} LP.

Keine Pause.card_desc: [Waffe] Erhöht dein Lauftempo während des Feuerns um {scale=5|5}%.

Kristallkondensator.card_desc: [Raketenwerfer] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Raketenwerfer um {scale=0.7|0.7}s.

Luftangriff.card_desc: [Vormarsch] Vormarsch erhält eine dritte Ladung. Stehst du bei Aktivierung still, hebst du vom Boden ab.

Luftgek\u00fchlt.card_desc: [Vormarsch] Bei Aktivierung von Vormarsch wirst du {scale=80|80} LP geheilt.

Maxi-Magazine.card_desc: [Vormarsch] Die Aktivierung von Vormarsch erzeugt {scale=15|15} Munition.

Metallmarsch.card_desc: [Raketenwerfer] Nach Aktivierung von Raketenwerfer wird erlittener Schaden 2s lang um {scale=3|3}% reduziert.

N\u00e4he.card_desc: [Vormarsch] Nach Aktivierung von Vormarsch wird erlittener Schaden 3s lang um {scale=3|3}% reduziert.

Nanotechnologie.card_desc: [Emitter] Während Emitter wirst du pro Sekunde {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Raketenfeuer.card_desc: [Raketenwerfer] Du kannst bis zu 3 Ladungen von Raketenwerfer speichern.

Refraktion.card_desc: [Emitter] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Emitter um {scale=1|1}s.

Regenerative Legierung.card_desc: [Emitter] Während Emitter wird pro Sekunde {scale=5|5} Munition erzeugt.

Schnelllader.card_desc: [Waffe] Eliminierungen erhöhen dein Nachladetempo 5s lang um {scale=7|7}%.

Treibstoffreserve.card_desc: [Vormarsch] Erhöht die Weite von Vormarsch um {scale=7|7}%.

\u00dcberfluss.card_desc: [Raketenwerfer] Bei Aktivierung von Raketenwerfer wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

W\u00e4chter.card_desc: [Emitter] Erhöht die Dauer von Emitter um {scale=1|1}s.

Alliage r\u00e9g\u00e9n\u00e9ratif.card_desc: [Émetteur] Tant qu'il est actif, Émetteur redonne {scale=5|5} munitions par seconde.

Assaut a\u00e9rien.card_desc: [Propulsion] Propulsion dispose d'une 3e charge et si vous ne bougez pas, son déplacement est vertical.

Combustible.card_desc: [Propulsion] La distance de Propulsion augmente de {scale=7|7}%.

Contre-mesure.card_desc: [Armure] Passer en-dessous de 30% de PV donne un bouclier de {scale=150|150} PV pendant 4s.

D\u00e9luge de roquettes.card_desc: [Lance-missiles] Vous pouvez stocker jusqu'à 3 charges de lance-missiles.

G\u00e9n\u00e9rateur de flux.card_desc: [Émetteur] Le bouclier d'Émetteur a 1250 PV de plus.

Marche de plomb.card_desc: [Lance-missiles] Après Lance-missiles, vous subissez {scale=3|3}% de dégâts en moins pendant 2s.

Nanotechnologie.card_desc: [Émetteur] Tant qu'il est actif, Émetteur vous soigne de {scale=50|50} PV par seconde.

Proximit\u00e9.card_desc: [Propulsion] Pendant 3s, Propulsion réduit de {scale=3|3}% vos dégâts subis.

Recharge rapide.card_desc: [Arme] Chaque élimination augmente votre vitesse de rechargement de {scale=7|7}% pendant 5s.

Sur le qui-vive.card_desc: [Lance-missiles] Chaque missile qui touche un ennemi redonne {scale=5|5} munitions.

Toujours chaud.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse en tirant augmente de {scale=5|5}%.

\u50a8\u5907\u71c3\u6599.card_desc: [突进] 突进的移动距离提升{scale=7|7}%

\u53cd\u5236\u624b\u6bb5.card_desc: [护甲] 生命值低于30%将使你获得一个可以吸收{scale=150|150}伤害的护盾，持续4秒

\u5907\u6218\u72b6\u6001.card_desc: [导弹发射器] 导弹发射器击中的敌人显形{scale=1|1}秒

\u5907\u7528\u5f39\u5939.card_desc: [突进] 激活技能可以回复{scale=15|15}发弹药

\u5bfc\u5f39\u4fb5\u88ad.card_desc: [导弹发射器]可以最多储存3发导弹

\u6298\u5c04\u6d82\u5c42.card_desc: [离子护盾] 减少离子护盾的冷却时间{scale=1|1}秒

\u63a5\u8fd1\u6218.card_desc: [突进] 激活突进2秒内获得{scale=3|3}%伤害减免

\u6c34\u6676\u7535\u5bb9.card_desc: [导弹发射器] 导弹发射器的冷却时间降低{scale=0.7|0.7}秒

\u7535\u78c1\u8109\u51b2.card_desc: [离子护盾] 激活离子护盾后，每秒生成{scale=5|5}发弹药。

\u75af\u72c2\u626b\u5c04.card_desc: [武器] 增加你开火时的移动速度{scale=2.5|2.5}%

\u770b\u5b88\u8005.card_desc: [离子护盾] 持续时间增加{scale=1|1}秒

\u7a7a\u4e2d\u538b\u5236.card_desc: [突进] 突进最多存储3次。站定不动时会向空中突进

\u7a7a\u6c14\u51b7\u5374.card_desc: [突进] 激活突进时回复{scale=80|80}点生命值

\u7eb3\u7c73\u62a4\u76fe.card_desc: [离子护盾] 离子护盾激活时，每秒回复{scale=50|50}点生命值

\u805a\u80fd\u529b\u573a.card_desc: [离子护盾] 离子护盾的生命值增加1250

\u80fd\u91cf\u8fc7\u5269I.card_desc: [导演发射器] 使用导弹发射器后回复{scale=100|100}点生命

\u88c5\u586b\u52a0\u901f.card_desc: [武器] 击败敌人或助攻时可以使你的装填速度增加{scale=7|7}%，持续5秒

\u94c1\u7532\u519b\u56e2.card_desc: [导弹发射器] 使用导弹发射器后，2秒内受到的所有伤害降低{scale=3|3}%

E.M.P..card_desc: [Emitter] Upon activating Emitter, slow nearby enemies within 30 units by 15% for 3s

Fuel Reserves.card_desc: [Hover] Increase the duration of Hover by 40%.

Heat Diffuser.card_desc: [Emitter] Reduce the Cooldown of Emitter by 2s.

Nanotechnology.card_desc: [Emitter] While Emitter is active, heal for 50 Health each second.

No Chill.card_desc: [Dual Fire] Increase your movement speed while dual firing by 20%

Proximity.card_desc: [Weapon] Deal up to +8% damage to close targets, dealing more the closer they are to you

Purge.card_desc: [Emitter] Activating Emitter reduces all Damage Over Time effects on you by 25%.

Warden.card_desc: [Emitter] Increases the Health of Emitter's shield by 400.

Aire fresco.card_desc: [Avance] Al activar Avance, te curas {scale=80|80} PS.

Aleaci\u00f3n regenerativa.card_desc: [Emisor] Mientras Emisor se encuentre activo, recuperas {scale=5|5} de munición por segundo.

Aluvi\u00f3n de cohetes.card_desc: [Lanzamisiles] Puedes sostener hasta 3 cargas de Lanzamisiles.

Asalto a\u00e9reo.card_desc: [Avance] Obtienes una 3.ª carga. Si se activa mientras está quieto, Ruckus se impulsa hacia arriba.

Cargador raudo.card_desc: [Arma] Las eliminaciones aumentan tu Velocidad de recarga un {scale=7|7}% durante 5 s.

Condensador de cristal.card_desc: [Lanzamisiles] La recarga de Lanzamisiles reduce en {scale=0.7|0.7} s.

Desequilibrado.card_desc: [Arma] Aumentas tu velocidad de movimiento un {scale=5|5}% mientras disparas

Generador de flujo.card_desc: [Emisor] Aumentas la salud del escudo del Emisor en 1250 PS.

Marcha firme.card_desc: [Lanzamisiles] Obtienes un {scale=3|3}% de reducción de daño durante 2 s tras activar Lanzamisiles.

Nanotecnolog\u00eda.card_desc: [Emisor] Mientras está activo, te curas {scale=50|50} PS por segundo.

Opulencia.card_desc: [Lanzamisiles] Te curas {scale=100|100} PS tras activar Lanzamisiles.

Presto.card_desc: [Lanzamisiles] Golpes exitosos con Lanzamisiles restauran {scale=5|5} de munición.

Prevenci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Armadura] Si tu salud máxima está por debajo del 30 %, obtienes un escudo de {scale=150|150} PS durante 4 s.

Proximidad.card_desc: [Avance] Al activar Avance otorga un {scale=3|3}% de reducción de daño por 3 s.

Refracci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Emisor] Se reduce la recarga de Emisor en {scale=1|1}s.

Reservas de combustible.card_desc: [Avance] La distancia de Avance aumenta un {scale=7|7}%.

A Postos.card_desc: [Lançador de Mísseis] Cada míssil do Lançador de Mísseis que acertar um inimigo concede {scale=5|5} de munição.

Ataque A\u00e9reo.card_desc: [Avançar] Avançar ganha uma terceira carga. Ficar parado faz com que Ruckus voe na vertical para cima.

Bateria de M\u00edsseis.card_desc: [Lançador de Mísseis] Você agora pode acumular até 3 cargas do Lançador de Mísseis.

Capacitor de Cristal.card_desc: [Lançador de Mísseis] Reduz o intervalo do Lançador de Mísseis em {scale=0.7|0.7}s.

Carregador R\u00e1pido.card_desc: [Arma] Eliminações aumentam em {scale=7|7}% por 5s a velocidade para recarregar a arma.

Contramedida.card_desc: [Armadura] Chegar abaixo de 30% da sua vida máxima concede um escudo com {scale=150|150} de vida por 4s.

Gerador de Fluxo.card_desc: [Emissor] Aumenta a vida do escudo do Emissor em 1250.

Guardi\u00e3o.card_desc: [Emissor] Aumenta a duração do Emissor em {scale=1|1}s.

Liga Regenerativa.card_desc: [Emissor] Enquanto o Emissor estiver ativo ele gera {scale=5|5} de munição por segundo.

Mais Combust\u00edvel.card_desc: [Avançar] Aumenta a distância de Avançar em {scale=7|7}%.

Marcha Met\u00e1lica.card_desc: [Lançador de Mísseis] Ganha {scale=3|3}% de redução de dano por 3s depois de ativar o Lançador de Mísseis.

Nanotecnologia.card_desc: [Emissor] Enquanto Emissor estiver ativo, cura {scale=50|50} de vida a cada segundo.

Opul\u00eancia.card_desc: [Lançador de Mísseis] Cura em {scale=100|100} de vida ao ativar o Lançador de Mísseis.

Proximidade.card_desc: [Avançar] Ativar Avançar dá {scale=3|3}% de redução de dano por 3s.

Refra\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Emissor] Reduz o intervalo do Emissor em {scale=1|1}s.

Sem No\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Arma] Sua velocidade de movimento aumenta em {scale=5|5}% enquanto estiver atirando.

\u0411\u043b\u0438\u0437\u043e\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Наступление] При активации Наступления вы получаете на {scale=3|3}% меньше урона в течение 3 с.

\u0411\u044b\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Устранения увеличивают скорость перезарядки на {scale=7|7}% на 5 с.

\u0412\u043e\u0437\u0434\u0443\u0448\u04.card_desc: [Наступление] Наступление получает третий заряд. Стоя неподвижно, Рукус может взлететь вверх.

\u0413\u0435\u043d\u0435\u0440\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Излучатель] Щит Излучателя становится на 1250 ед. прочнее.

\u0416\u0435\u043b\u0435\u0437\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Ракетная установка] После активации Ракетной установки вы получаете на {scale=3|3}% меньше урона в течение 2 с.

\u0418\u0437\u043e\u0431\u0438\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Ракетная установка] Активация Ракетной установки исцеляет вас на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041a\u043e\u043d\u0434\u0438\u0446\u04.card_desc: [Наступление] Активация Наступления исцеляет вас на {scale=80|80} ед.

\u041a\u043e\u043d\u0442\u0440\u043c\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья ниже 30% от максимального вы получаете щит прочностью {scale=150|150} ед. на 4 с.

\u041a\u0440\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Ракетная установка] Перезарядка Ракетной установки сокращается на {scale=0.7|0.7} с.

\u041d\u0430\u0438\u0437\u0433\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Ракетная установка] Попадания Ракетной установкой восстанавливают {scale=5|5} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041d\u0430\u043d\u043e\u0442\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Излучатель] Во время действия Излучателя вы исцеляетесь на {scale=50|50} ед. в секунду.

\u041e\u043f\u0440\u043e\u043c\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваша скорость передвижения при стрельбе увеличивается на {scale=5|5}%.

\u0420\u0430\u043a\u0435\u0442\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Ракетная установка] Вы можете накопить до 3 зарядов Ракетной установки.

\u0421\u043f\u043b\u0430\u0432 \u0440\u0.card_desc: [Излучатель] Во время действия Излучателя вы генерируете {scale=5|5} ед. боеприпасов в секунду.

\u0421\u0442\u0440\u0430\u0436.card_desc: [Излучатель] Длительность действия Излучателя увеличивается на {scale=1|1} с.

Ani chwili luzu.card_desc: [Broń] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu podczas strzelania o {scale=5|5}%.

Generator p\u0142ywu.card_desc: [Emiter] Zwiększa odporność tarczy Emitera o 1250 pkt.

Gotowy do u\u017cycia.card_desc: [Wyrzutnia rakiet] Udane trafienia Wyrzutnią rakiet przywracają {scale=5|5} szt. amunicji.

Kondensator kryszta\u0142\u00f3w.card_desc: [Wyrzutnia rakiet] Skraca czas odnowienia Wyrzutni rakiet o {scale=0.7|0.7} s.

Nanotechnologia.card_desc: [Emiter] Gdy Emiter jest aktywny, co sekundę przywraca {scale=50|50} PZ.

Obfito\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Wyrzutnia rakiet] Przywraca {scale=100|100} PZ w momencie aktywacji Wyrzutni rakiet.

Refrakcja.card_desc: [Emiter] Skraca czas odnowienia Emitera o {scale=1|1} s.

Regeneracyjny stop.card_desc: [Emiter] Emiter generuje {scale=5|5} szt. amunicji na sekundę.

\u015arodki zapobiegawcze.card_desc: [Pancerz] Jeśli twoja wartość PZ spadnie poniżej 30%, zyskujesz na 4 s. tarczę o odporności {scale=150|150} pkt.

Stalowy krok.card_desc: [Wyrzutnia rakiet] Zapewnia {scale=3|3}% redukcji odnoszonych obrażeń przez 2 s po aktywacji Wyrzutni rakiet.

Stra\u017cnik.card_desc: [Emiter] Wydłuża czas trwania Emitera o {scale=1|1} s.

Szturm powietrzny.card_desc: [Natarcie] Natarcie zyskuje 3 ładunek. Stanie w miejscu powoduje wystrzelenie Ruckusa w górę.

Szybkie prze\u0142adowanie.card_desc: [Broń] Eliminacje zwiększają szybkość przeładowania o {scale=7|7}% na 5 s.

Zapora rakietowa.card_desc: [Wyrzutnia rakiet] Można zgromadzić do 3 kumulacji wyrzutni rakiet.

Zbli\u017cenie.card_desc: [Natarcie] Aktywacja Natarcia przyznaje {scale=3|3}% redukcji obrażeń na 3 s.

Bolluk.card_desc: [Füze Rampası] Füze Rampası'nı etkinleştirince {scale=100|100} Can iyileş.

Havadan Taarruz.card_desc: [İlerle] İlerle 3. bir kullanım kazanır ve hareketsiz durmak Ruckus'un jetle yukarı gitmesine neden olur.

Haz\u0131r.card_desc: [Füze Rampası] Füze Rampası ile yapılan başarılı vuruşlar {scale=5|5} Cephane oluşturur.

H\u0131zl\u0131 Doldurucu.card_desc: [Silah] Saf dışı bırakmalar, Yeniden Doldurma Hızını 5 sn boyunca %{scale=7|7} artırır.

Kar\u015f\u0131 Tedbir.card_desc: [Zırh] Maksimum Canının %30'unun altına düştüğünde 4 sn boyunca {scale=150|150} Canı olan bir Kalkan kazanırsın.

Kristal Kondansat\u00f6r\u00fc.card_desc: [Füze Rampası] Füze Rampası'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.7|0.7} sn azalt.

Metalik Geni\u015fleme.card_desc: [Füze Rampası] Füze Rampası'nı etkinleştirdikten sonra 2 sn boyunca %{scale=3|3} Hasar Azaltma kazan.

Nanoteknoloji.card_desc: [Verici] Verici etkinken, her saniye {scale=50|50} Can iyileş.

Roket Ya\u011fmuru.card_desc: [Füze Rampası] 3'e kadar Füze Rampası atışına sahip olabilirsin.

Yak\u0131nl\u0131k.card_desc: [İlerle] İlerle'yi etkinleştirmek 3 sn boyunca %{scale=3|3} Hasar Azaltma verir.
